ComicInfo.Summary:
The war between the forces of Sci-Tech and the militant Naturalists takes an earth-shaking turn as the miniseries concludes! Leo Lom ax fully reveals his own latent super powers! Capable of manipulating his own genetic structure and its abilities, Leo is finally reborn into Sci-Tech's warrior of tomorrow. But will it be enough to free him from the Naturalists' island base? Plus, Leo makes a shocking discovery about his mysterious past and his long-lost mother and faces the mechanized vixen named Omnia in final combat!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/sci-tech-4-reunion/4000-119108/
ComicInfo.Title: Reunion
